instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3023: What is 820-3023? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.P3V42_G3H: What is P3V42_G3H? P3V42_G3H is a typo of PP3V42_G3H.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no water damage. light on MG. Fan spin. No chime. No image.
threads.message:
Hi there,

No signs of water damage. Customer says started beeping and switched off. After that does not turn on anymore.

no water damage. light on MG. Fan spin. No chime. No image.

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> - 8.4V

<SIGNAL>P3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> - 3.42V

L7260 - 3.3v

L9701 - 0v

L3895 - 0.2v

L7220 - 5.1v

L7100 - 0.9v

L7630 - 1v

L7330 - 1.5v

L7550 - 0v

L7510 - 1.2v

Please advise how to proceed. Something tells its not gonna be an easy one.

Thanks!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no water damage. light on MG. Fan spin. No chime. No image.
threads.message:
If started beeping, that is sign of RAM, or CPU issue.
Heat RAM and CPU for test.
You can also try to burn eventually accumulated crap; use quality flux.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no water damage. light on MG. Fan spin. No chime. No image.
threads.message: If it's beeping, this is trash. Dead CPU, dead PCH, dead RAM, broken internal trace etc. Waste of time.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no water damage. light on MG. Fan spin. No chime. No image.
threads.message:
It beeped when it died according to the customer.
when i test it, It does not beep.
Will try heating ram and cpu and burning crap.
